attributes.action: Debate About Forces in Iraq And Afganistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Soldiers in Iraq and Afgan have been out there too long many have been deployed longer than they should have. Many keep touring there. Its time to bring them back and fight terrorism and the taleban with politics rather than sacrificing people from the armed forces over Tony Blairs stupid weapons of mass destruction plea. Please Mr Brown if you are elected get our boys out of there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
